feedback.languagechange: Refresh the page to enjoy this language...

error.existinglogin: An account already exists with this login

label.title: Account activation
label.errorexplanation:
Sincere apologies for the inconvenience.

Please try again later.
label.activatedaccountexplanations:
Your account has been successfully activated.

You can now sign in!
label.notfoundaccountexplanations:
It seems the token from the url is not valid.

You may have already activated this account?

label.title: My account
label.mergedetails: Enables to merge two accounts together, which is relevant if you've been invited with two different emails.
label.anonymizedetails: Enables to remove personal information from the app, without affecting the tables you're part of.
label.closedetails: To permanently delete your account, removing you from any table you've been part of.

label.notablesexplanation:
You are not playing at any table so far...

Create a new table with using the "+" icon and invite your friends to play!
label.nogamesstatsexplanation:
You haven't played any game so far?

Play and save games to access to your stats here!

label.title: Table
label.deniedaccessexplanation:
You're not a member of this table.

You can't access a table you're not a memebr of.
label.nogameshistoryexplanation:
You haven't played any game so far?

Play and click the new game button to save your games and access the table history here!
label.nogamesstatsexplanation:
You haven't played any game so far?

Play and click the new game button to save your games and access the player stats here!
label.nouserscreateexplanation:
You have removed all players from the table.
It is not possible to ceate a table without any player, especially you no?

You can invite players to this table pressing the "+" icon.
label.nousersdeleteexplanation:
You have removed all players from the table.

Saving a table without any player will delete the table.

error.creationwithoutplayers: missing players to create a table
error.creationwithoutuser: table creation impossible without you among the players

delete.title: Sure to delete table?
delete.content:
You're about to delete the table.

This will delete the table and all associated games.

deletenoeusers.title: No more player here!
deletenoeusers.content:
All players have been deleted from this table.
A table can't exist without any player...

Proceeding will delete the table and all associated games.

deleteuser.title: Sure to remove this player?
deleteuser.content:
You're about to remove a player from the table.

If you proceed and save the table, the player won't have access anymore to this table, the player name will be removed from the table history and statistics.

delete.title: Sure to delete game?
delete.content:
You're about to delete the game.

This will delete the game and update the table accordingly.

label.tocomeintro: This functionality is not available yet.
label.tocomedetails:
We are delighted by your interest and propose to record it for the team to prioritize for this! 
 This is anonymous ;)
label.addmessage: You can add message to make your point

input.consent: I accept the use of this feedback to improve the product
